Introduction: Oh, hey! You're that new farmer!#$e#Welcome to Pelican Town!
spring_Mon: I heard the Wizard muttering about the "language of the forest" recently.#$b#I wonder what that's about.#$b#Maybe it's something he'll teach me soon.
spring_Tue: I really want to dye my hair.#$b#Maybe an electric blue color. That sounds pretty cool.
spring_Thu: I'm studying with the wizard.#$e#I hope to become a wizard myself someday.#$e#He makes terrible company, though.
spring_Sat: The wizard makes me buy him groceries.#$b#He says he's "Too amazing to go into town."#$e#Whatever.#$b#I don't even see him eat anything.#$b#What does he do with the food?
spring_Sun: Have you met the traveling merchant?#$b#She's very slay.#$e#Literally an icon.#$e#Like yas queen, give me red cabbage seeds for 800g!#$b#Know your worth!#$b#Capitalism!
summer_Tue: Is Pelican Town a 15-minute city?#$b#I guess it is.#$e#There are like 2 gas-powered vehicles in this whole town.#$e#I guess I could say I'm living my best life.
summer_Wed: I've been drying herbs this summer.#$b#It's making me feel very cottage-core.#$e#Here, you can have some. [917]
summer_Thu: Shelby is so precious. She really takes care of everyone, and slays while doing it.#$b#Mother is mothering.
summer_Fri: I hope Gus saved some bruschetta for me.#$b#That stuff frickin' slaps.#$e#I love bread, honestly.
summer_Sat: Sometimes I like to look out at the lake by the wizard tower.#$e#You can see so many fish grazing the surface of the water.
summer_Sun: Nobody here realizes I know the difference between volts and amps.#$b#So basically, nobody here knows I'm better than everyone else.#$b#I'm kidding, of course.
fall_Mon: I try not to spend all my money at Joja-Mart, but like, I'm so broke.#$b#It's impossible to shop ethically and affordably.#$e#"Voting with your dollar" is a priveleged mindset.
fall_Tue: I'm stronger than I look.#$e#I could bench press you.#$e#Without a spotter.
fall_Fri: Oh, hey @!#$e#Can I tell you something?#$e#I was failing this spell today.#$b#Trying my best! But still failing.#$b#The Wizard says to me that my wrists are too limp.#$b#TOO LIMP.#$b#I've never been so hatecrimed.#$e#I'd rather he just call me a slur.
winter_Mon: Wealth inequality is tearing this nation apart.#$b#I just want to live somewhere where we all support each other.
winter_Tue: I have a younger brother who lives back in the city.#$b#He's such a dweeb.#$e#I miss him, though.
winter_Sat: Just between you and me... Abigail is definitely related to the Wizard, right?#$b#Like, cousins or something?#$b#Yeah, that must be it.
